Name: Alien Shepherd
About the game: Gameplay A unique 2D precision platformer game in which you control an alien shepherd that goes looking for a missing sheep. More than 50 different levels with increasing difficulty Two game modes (normal/hard) to please casual and hardcore players Oldschool handcrafted pixel-art A unique mechanic that allows flying in any direction for a short period of time A cute pet jellyfish
